extendedInfo.description: Welcome to iDrag!This program features several different calculators to help aid any car calculation you may need. Within iDrag, there are several different categories of calculations that can be performed - ranging much more than just drag racing calculations. This program would be great for engine builders, drag racers, track racers, and all car enthusiasts.- General Car Conversions- Density Altitude- Gear Ratio / Tire Diameter / Speed- Engine Displacement / Compression- BHP loss - Conversions from Torque to HP- 1/4 mile estimates / 1/8 mile estimates- Flywheel to WHP- NHRA Correction Factors- Piston Speed/Acceleration- Wind Resistance / Drag Force- Injector Sizing- HP From Injector Flow- Intercooler Efficiency- Results From Injector Size Change- Cam Timing Events- Advertised Intake Closing Point- Power To Weight Ratio- Head Chamber Volume - Determine Type- Intercooler Efficiency- Compression From Boost- Dynamic Compression / Stroke- Piston Volume- Correct Density Altitudes To Another- Speeds / Transmission Gears- G-Forces From 60'- Lateral Speed / G-Force- Wheel Rate / Spring Rate/ Leaf Spring Rate- MPG - Miles Per Gallon- Mustang To Dynojet Conversion- Brake Specific Fuel Consumption- Speedometer Error- Octane Calculator- Timing Mark Calculator- Air/Fuel Conversions- Valve Lift Rocker Ratio- Engine Milling / Compression Change- Overboring / Displacement Change- HP From Boost- Pitot Pressure to FPS- Cross Sectional Area- Optimum Header Length- Intake Runner / Torque- Optimum Intake Runner Length- TB Runner Diameter- Injector Pulse Widths- Center Of GravityAND MUCH MUCH MORE!

reviews.comment: The calculations are great aside from me not being able to use 7. When I hit 7 it closes. It doesn\'t crash it just closes. Fix this and I\'ll have no choice but to put a five.
reviews.author: Aautin Porterfield

reviews.title: I can\'t use it
reviews.comment: The first formula I tried using was the injector sizing. Entering a 7 on any value closes the app and it will not accept any values in the BSFC . Too bad, lots of nice stuff here otherwise.
reviews.author: Pete Jank

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Very useful app and I use it all the time at the strip.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Slow
reviews.comment: Excruciatingly slow when switching to different calculators.
reviews.author: Harvey Brooks

reviews.comment: Using the number 7 in any calculation causes it to crash. Please fix.
reviews.author: Travis Lane

reviews.comment: A lot of info but fix the app from closing on its own
reviews.author: keith feemster

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Most comprehensive engine and racing calc collection I\'ve seen, no ads, and thoughtfully programmed. Couple of typographical errors but nothing to worry about. Highly recommended!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Worked fine on my S2, crashes on S3
reviews.comment: I have been using this app for a couple years, had it on my iPhone, then my galaxy S2, never with any issues, after the install to the S3, it just keeps crashing...  Will rerate 5 stars once issue is fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Had to uninstall
reviews.comment: 7 caused it to close. No decimal point on keypad in overbore calculator.
reviews.author: John Waterman

reviews.title: Not as convenient as it could be
reviews.comment: Having to put in simple losses and percentages, means i can do the calculations faster by myself than using the app, build them in, this feels like a note pad
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fix it
reviews.comment: You should update to fix bugs
reviews.author: Nate Kuertz
